WizardTD.Tile

Class IceTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Entity
      • WizardTD.Tile.Tile
        • WizardTD.Tile.Tower
          • WizardTD.Tile.IceTower

  • public class IceTower
extends Tower
    The IceTower class represents an ice-themed tower in the game, which can slow and attack enemies within its range. It is a specialized tower that extends the Tower class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeTowerSprite()
      Changes the ice tower's sprite based on its base level.
      void purchaseTower()
      Deducts the cost of purchasing an IceTower from the player's mana when an Icetower is created.
      void tick()
      Updates the IceTower's behavior and attacks enemies within its range with iceballs depending on the tower's attack speed.
